languages.text: Ксеносы скупо благодарят Вольного Торговца и направляют корабль к далеким звездам — на верную смерть в пустоте. Всем на мостике ясно без слов, что раненый корабль никогда не достигнет своей цели. И спустя несколько терранских дней голубоватая вспышка на краю системы подтверждает печальный исход.

traits.locale_text: Эльдары принимают передачу данных. Не понимая, чем заслужили такую благосклонность от мон-кай, ксеносы скупо благодарят Вольного Торговца и спешат скорее покинуть систему.

languages.text: The xenos half-heartedly thank the Rogue Trader and turn their ship toward distant stars and inevitable death in the void. No words are exchanged on the bridge, but everyone understands that the wounded ship will never make it there. A few Terran days later, a blue flash at the edge of the system confirms the vessel's unfortunate fate.
languages.original_text: Ксеносы скупо благодарят Вольного Торговца и направляют корабль к далеким звездам — на верную смерть в пустоте. Всем на мостике ясно без слов, что раненый корабль никогда не достигнет своей цели. И спустя несколько терранских дней голубоватая вспышка на краю системы подтверждает печальный исход.

traits.locale_text: Aeldari accept the data transfer. The xenos half-heartedly thank the Rogue Trader, not understanding what earned them the favour of the mon-keigh, and hastily leave the system.

The xenos half-heartedly thank the Rogue Trader and turn their ship toward distant stars and inevitable death in the void. No words are exchanged on the bridge, but everyone understands that the wounded ship will never make it there. A few Terran days later, a blue flash at the edge of the system confirms the vessel's unfortunate fate.

No words are exchanged on the bridge, but everyone understands that the wounded ship will never make it there. A few Terran days later, a blue flash at the edge of the system confirms the vessel's unfortunate fate.

The xenos half-heartedly thank the Rogue Trader and turn their ship toward distant stars and inevitable death in the void. No words are exchanged on the bridge, but everyone understands that the wounded ship will never make it there. A few Terran days later, a blue flash at the edge of the system confirms the vessel's unfortunate fate.

languages.text: Les xénos remercient {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} sans enthousiasme, puis mettent le cap vers des étoiles lointaines et leur mort inévitable dans le vide. Aucun mot n'est échangé sur la passerelle, mais tout le monde comprend que le vaisseau endommagé ne parviendra jamais à destination. Quelques jours de Terra plus tard, un éclair bleu aux confins du système confirme le sort funeste de l'appareil.
languages.original_text: The xenos half-heartedly thank the Rogue Trader and turn their ship toward distant stars and inevitable death in the void. No words are exchanged on the bridge, but everyone understands that the wounded ship will never make it there. A few Terran days later, a blue flash at the edge of the system confirms the vessel's unfortunate fate.

traits.locale_text: Les xénos remercient {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} sans enthousiasme, puis mettent le cap vers des étoiles lointaines et leur mort inévitable dans le vide. Aucun mot n'est échangé sur la passerelle, mais tout le monde comprend que le vaisseau endommagé ne parviendra jamais à destination. Quelques jours de Terra plus tard, un éclair bleu aux confins du système confirme le sort funeste de l’appareil.

languages.text: 異種族たちは自由開拓者に中途半端な態度で礼を言うと、船を遠い星々の避けられない虚空での死へと向かわせた。ブリッジでは何の言葉も交わされなかったが、傷ついた船がそこにたどり着くことは不可能だと誰もが思っていた。数日後、星系の端に青い閃光が走り、この船の不幸な運命を確信した。
languages.original_text: The xenos half-heartedly thank the Rogue Trader and turn their ship toward distant stars and inevitable death in the void. No words are exchanged on the bridge, but everyone understands that the wounded ship will never make it there. A few Terran days later, a blue flash at the edge of the system confirms the vessel's unfortunate fate.

traits.locale_text: 異種族たちは自由開拓者に中途半端な態度で礼を言うと、船を遠い星々の避けられない虚空での死へと向かわせた。ブリッジでは何の言葉も交わされなかったが、傷ついた船がそこにたどり着くことは不可能だと誰もが思っていた。数日後、星系の端に青い閃光が走り、この船の不幸な運命を確信した。

languages.text: 那些异形漫不经心感谢了行商浪人，将他们的飞船转向了遥远的星球，踏上了必死无疑的旅程。舰桥上没有任何人说话，但所有的人都心知肚明：这艘受损的舰船根本不可能抵达目的地。几个泰拉日过后，星系边缘传来了一道蓝色闪光，证实了那艘飞船不幸的下场。
languages.original_text: The xenos half-heartedly thank the Rogue Trader and turn their ship toward distant stars and inevitable death in the void. No words are exchanged on the bridge, but everyone understands that the wounded ship will never make it there. A few Terran days later, a blue flash at the edge of the system confirms the vessel's unfortunate fate.

traits.locale_text: 那些异形漫不经心感谢了行商浪人，将他们的飞船转向了遥远的星球，踏上了必死无疑的旅程。舰桥上没有任何人说话，但所有的人都心知肚明：这艘受损的舰船根本不可能抵达目的地。几个泰拉日过后，星系边缘传来了一道蓝色闪光，证实了那艘飞船不幸的下场。

languages.text: Los xenos dan las gracias sin entusiasmo {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente y giran su nave hacia las estrellas lejanas y la muerte inevitable en el vacío. No se intercambian palabras en el puente, pero todos comprenden que la nave nunca llegará a su destino. Unos días terranos más tarde, un destello azul en el borde del sistema confirma el desafortunado destino de la nave.
languages.original_text: The xenos half-heartedly thank the Rogue Trader and turn their ship toward distant stars and inevitable death in the void. No words are exchanged on the bridge, but everyone understands that the wounded ship will never make it there. A few Terran days later, a blue flash at the edge of the system confirms the vessel's unfortunate fate.

traits.locale_text: Los xenos dan las gracias sin entusiasmo {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente y giran su nave hacia las estrellas lejanas y la muerte inevitable en el vacío. No se intercambian palabras en el puente, pero todos comprenden que la nave nunca llegará a su destino. Unos días terranos más tarde, un destello azul en el borde del sistema confirma el desafortunado destino de la nave.

languages.text: Die Xenos danken {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} halbherzig und steuern ihr Schiff fernen Sternen entgegen — und dem unvermeidlichen Tod in der Leere. Auf der Brücke werden keinerlei Worte gewechselt, doch allen ist klar, dass das verwundete Schiff niemals ankommen wird. Einige terranische Tage später bestätigt ein blauer Blitz am Rand des Systems das bedauerliche Schicksal des Schiffs.
languages.original_text: The xenos half-heartedly thank the Rogue Trader and turn their ship toward distant stars and inevitable death in the void. No words are exchanged on the bridge, but everyone understands that the wounded ship will never make it there. A few Terran days later, a blue flash at the edge of the system confirms the vessel's unfortunate fate.

traits.locale_text: Die Xenos danken {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} halbherzig und steuern ihr Schiff fernen Sternen entgegen — und dem unvermeidlichen Tod in der Leere. Auf der Brücke werden keinerlei Worte gewechselt, doch allen ist klar, dass das verwundete Schiff niemals ankommen wird. Einige terranische Tage später bestätigt ein blauer Blitz am Rand des Systems das bedauerliche Schicksal des Schiffs.

languages.text: Zenolar, Hür Tacir'e gönülsüzce teşekkür ediyor ve gemilerini uzak yıldızlara, uçsuzda kaçınılmaz bir ölüme doğru çeviriyor. Köprüde kimse konuşmasa da herkes, hasarlı geminin oraya ulaşamayacağını anlıyor. Birkaç Terra günü sonra sistemin ucundaki mavi bir ışık parlaması, geminin talihsiz sonunu doğruluyor.
languages.original_text: The xenos half-heartedly thank the Rogue Trader and turn their ship toward distant stars and inevitable death in the void. No words are exchanged on the bridge, but everyone understands that the wounded ship will never make it there. A few Terran days later, a blue flash at the edge of the system confirms the vessel's unfortunate fate.
